content.question: Which of the following resulted most directly from the ideas expressed in the excerpt?

choices.label: The redirection of federal funding from urban social programs to the Vietnam War
Building sentiment among Civil Rights activists for the use of passive resistance and peaceful protest
Intensification of political and cultural debates over changes in African American family structures
Growing opposition among Civil Rights activists to Democratic political leaders who supported the status quo

content.answer: Growing opposition among Civil Rights activists to Democratic political leaders who supported the status quo

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
